PUBLIC HEALTH CENTERS
The Public Health Centers offer a variety of services to the community.
Open Monday - Wednesday and Friday 8am to 5pm, Thursday 10am - 5pm.
 Clinic hours may be extended to meet community needs.
For an appointment, please call the most convenient public health
 center or make an
on-line
 appointment
. An appointment is not required to receive
 services.
For
 instructions on how to make an appointment, click here.

CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE SURVEY
The County of San Diego, Medical Care Services strives to provide
 every one of our customers with a positive experience and would like
 to hear your thoughts. Your input will help us provide exceptional services.
County of San Diego Health & Human Services Agency (HHSA) Medical Care Services Customer Experience Survey
